          EPOS, EPOS Recommends

          7 Best Barber Shops in Singapore That Are A Cut Above The Rest

          Posted on July 20, 2022November 4, 2022 by Adrija Chakravarti

          Men’s grooming has often gone under the radar with the popular belief that getting a $10 quick cut is all that’s needed. While that’s not always a bad idea, sometimes splurging on grooming at a barber shop and looking your best is needed. After all, first impressions are the most important, aren’t they?

          Not only that, but looking and feeling your best can make you more confident and ready to take on the world! So whether you’re looking for a stylish transformation or a simple, fresh trim, these 7 best barber shops in Singapore will give you the pampering you deserve!

          Contents hide
          Best Barber Shop in Singapore
          1. The Mezz (Kingsmen Gentlemen’s Grooming)
          2. Sultans of Shave
          3. Rogue and Beyond
          4. The Panic Room
          5. Splice Barbershop
          6. Barber 25
          7. DeepCuts Barber’s
          Conclusion
          Related Posts

          Best Barber Shop in Singapore

          1. The Mezz (Kingsmen Gentlemen’s Grooming)

          Source: Kingsmen Gentlemen’s Grooming via Facebook – Barber Shop Singapore

          Facebook: Visit Here

          Instagram: Visit Here

          Website: https://www.themezz.sg/

          Address: 30 Raffles Place, Singapore 048622 | 13 North Canal Road, Singapore 048826

          Operating Hours: Mon-Fri, 10:45am-8pm and Sat, 11am-5:30am (Raffles Place) | Mon-Fri, 10:30am-10pm and Sat, 11am-6pm (North Canal)

          Formerly known as Kingsmen Gentlemen’s Grooming, The Mezz has not abandoned its origins in bespoke barbering. Instead, they’ve started a new and elevated chapter in grooming, lifestyle experiences and friendship. So sit back and enjoy the best men’s grooming experiences all under one roof! From exquisite haircuts, facials and shaves, you’ll look and feel sharp once this barber shop in Singapore is done with you.

          Moreover, The Mezz encourages you to enjoy your time with them. Join them for a cup of coffee (or even happy hour!), stay for a chat or a meeting, and relax at the lounge and bar. You’ll find respite from the hustle and bustle of your regular life right here at The Mezz!

          2. Sultans of Shave

          Source: Sultans of Shave via Facebook – Barber Shop Singapore

          Facebook: Visit Here

          Instagram: Visit Here

          Website: https://sultansofshave.com/

          Address: Locations

          Operating Hours: Locations

          Born from the desire to revive one of the oldest professions in history – barbering – Sultans of Shaves provides premium male grooming and the finest of customer service to make their clients happy. Enjoy in-depth consultations with your barber to personalise your look to your preferences. You’ll find inspiration and passion at this barber shop along with a range of services that’ll make you relaxed and feeling refreshed. You’ll be able to choose beard shaves, treatments, haircuts and colouring; plus, add on a Barba Tricho Massage or a facial for some extra pampering. You deserve it!

          3. Rogue and Beyond

          Source: Rogue and Beyond via Facebook – Barber Shop Singapore

          Facebook: Visit Here

          Instagram: Visit Here

          Website: https://www.rogueandbeyond.com/

          Address: Locations

          Operating Hours: Tue-Fri, 10:30am-8pm | Sat-Sun, 10:30am-6pm

          Want a haircut that suits your features, personality and style? Rogue and Beyond strives to specially tailor cuts that’ll make you feel effortlessly stylish and sophisticated. Every appointment includes a consultation that’ll make you feel your best. Not to mention, any looks they design are easily recreated and taken care of at home! No more breaking the bank to look and feel your best everyday. Revel in premium contemporary haircuts at this barber shop in Singapore!

          4. The Panic Room

          Source: The Panic Room via Facebook – Barber Shop Singapore

          Facebook: Visit Here

          Instagram: Visit Here

          Website: https://thepanicroom.com.sg/

          Address: 311A Geylang Road, Singapore 389350

          Operating Hours: Mon-Fri, 11am-8pm | Sat-Sun, 9:30am-6:30pm

          Gentlemen, this isn’t your regular, classy barber shop. Instead, The Panic Room is a hipster’s paradise with posters, vinyls and street-inspired art plastered over the walls and furniture. So why don’t you relax and pamper yourself once in a while? From haircuts, hair washes and styling to beard trims and hot towel shaves, and massages and moonlit face washes, you’ll feel shiny and classy after just one visit!

          And that’s not all! Enjoy the full experience with ear cleaning, facials, manicures and pedicures (women aren’t the only ones who need to keep their nails trimmed and healthy!), food treatments and even paraffin therapy hand and feet waxing!

          5. Splice Barbershop

          Source: Splice Barbershop via Facebook – Barber Shop Singapore

          Facebook: Visit Here

          Instagram: Visit Here

          Website: https://www.splicebarbershop.com.sg/

          Address: 3 Temasek Boulevard, Singapore 038983

          Operating Hours: Daily, 11am-9pm

          Clean, unpretentious, modern. Splice Barbershop provides all that and more at their men’s grooming salon located in the heart of Suntec City. Their name, “Splice” means to connect and join. Hence, having started out as a retail shop selling cufflinks and many more complimentary products like watches, ties, shirts, bags and shoes, they expanded into a barber shop to fulfil every gentleman’s needs. 

          Browse their menu of cuts, shaves and trims for your hair, beard and moustache. You can also relax with spa manicures and pedicures, eyebrow care, ear and nose waxing, massages, hair treatments, colouring and more for the full package! With high end grooming and premium clothing and accessories, you’ll have everything to look your best.

          6. Barber 25

          Source: Barber 25 via Facebook – Barber Shop Singapore

          Facebook: Visit Here

          Instagram: Visit Here

          Website: https://www.barber25.net/

          Address: 6A Shenton Way, Singapore 068815

          Operating Hours: Mon-Fri, 9am-8pm | Sat-Sun, 10am-6pm

          Looking for that dapper professional look? Venture down to Barber 25, the home of supreme hair cuts for the businessperson. Barber 25 is a one-stop barber shop in Singapore, offering not only premium men’s grooming and shaving services, but also housing specialists in ladies’ hair. The “25” in their name, meaning “smile” in Japanese, aims to seek happy smiles from all of their clients. Treat yourself to a whole personal grooming experience and a little TLC at this amazing barber shop in Singapore!

          7. DeepCuts Barber’s

          Source: DeepCuts Barber’s via Facebook – Barber Shop Singapore

          Facebook: Visit Here

          Instagram: Visit Here

          Website: https://deepcuts.sg/barber

          Address: 47 Kampong Bahru Rd, Singapore 169361

          Operating Hours: Sat-Thu, 11am-9pm (by appointment only)

          DeepCuts: The One-Stop Grooming Den; it’s definitely one of the best barber shops in Singapore for someone looking for that quintessential classic haircut. Think full beard sculpting, hot towel shaves and elegant haircuts for the modern man. These passionate barbers will give you the makeover you’ve dreamed about with their top quality skills and experience. Meanwhile, grab a bespoke tailored suit while you’re at it for that extra professional feel!

          Conclusion

          So, are you ready to look dapper? Getting a haircut can be a tedious and boring task in and of itself, but when you visit one of these amazing barber shops in Singapore, you’ll get an experience like no other.

          • Written by Adrija Chakravarti
